IsaacExt:InNoMood.NAME: In No Mood
IsaacExt:InNoMood.DESCRIPTION: I'm in a hurry and not in the mood to play with you.

IsaacExt:Guilt.NAME: Guilt
IsaacExt:Guilt.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take damage equal to the number of cards in your hand. NL When drawn, if has another *Guilt in your hand, Exhaust all *Guilt in your hand and put a *Regret in your hand.
